Header.title: Advanced Data Anlaytics
Header.paragraph: We transform how companies make decisions

About.paragraph: Integrated business expertise and analytical prowess including data science techniques across the value chain to derive data-driven actionable insights
Why: Solutions are customized to meet the unique needs of each business
Collaborative approach to partner with clients to solve critical business problems
Accelerated impact  by prioritizing quick wins
Solutions that focus on using a decision sciences and analytics-based approach to generate superior returns for clients.

Services.name: DATA AND ANALYTICS
Services.text: Data is at the heart of business transformation. Our solutions provide insights that help you develop new products and services, elevate customer experience, and enhance business outcomes.

Services.name: SUSTAINABILITY SERVICES
Services.text: Sustainability is a collective goal requiring us all to work together. To succeed, businesses need to shift from mitigation to regeneration, from a reactive mindset of ‘doing less harm’ to a proactive one of ‘doing more good’. The way forward is to use the power of technology and innovation to pioneer new, sustainable opportunities and take an ecosystem-led approach to build greater futures..

Services.name: ENTERPRISE SOLUTIONS
Services.text: Enterprise applications are the backbone of businesses today. Digital transformation requires a holistic approach with intelligent solutions from a range of ecosystem partners.

Testimonials.text: VKR has not only supported me to do an internship with my dream companies remotely. Through our academic curriculum I could only do internship between May-July, but through VKR I can pick up any number of interns anytime.
Testimonials.name: Rohit Jagtap

Testimonials.text: I had a family constraint to travel to different cities, but I wanted to show that I am a promising student who can turn out to be an asset for top companies. Through VKR I could reach some leading companies and even got connected for placements.
Testimonials.name: Mukul Jinwal

Testimonials.text: VKR is a practical learning platform, I could learn how actually a company researches and analyses and strategizes in reality, it was quite enlightening. I can have work immersion. It is a very valuable experience.
Testimonials.name: Somshankar Srivastava

Testimonials.text: I didn’t know beyond a handful of names of companies, this is like a portal opening to the entire corporate universe of India.
Testimonials.name: Mihir Bhatia

Testimonials.text: The best part with VKR is I could do it from my hostel, home whenever I had free time. Its quite engaging and through its evaluation I could get a scope to correct my concepts. The concept ofvideo interview is awesome!
Testimonials.name: Nandana Sen

Testimonials.text: Firstly I could identify what I really want to become after practicing through VKR, it helped me finding my true career interest.
Testimonials.name: Mayra Amin

Features.title: Easy Signup
Features.text: Signing up for our platform is quick and easy. No complicated forms or lengthy procedures. Just a few clicks and you're ready to go!

Features.title: Learn and Practice
Features.text: Our platform offers a comprehensive range of courses for you to learn and practice. From beginner to advanced levels, we have something for everyone.

Features.title: Submit Assignments
Features.text: Submitting assignments has never been easier. Our platform provides a user-friendly interface for you to submit your assignments quickly and efficiently.

Features.title: Video Interviews
Features.text: Our platform offers the option for video interviews, allowing you to showcase your skills and experience to potential employers in a seamless and convenient manner.
